credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
title: Chasuble fragments
provenance: From the collection of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt.
description: Blue satin ground with polychrome extra silk wefts forming a design of buildings at edge of water and great ship. Trimmed with coral and yellow silk ribbon.
name: Chasuble fragments
